definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: They tired out the enemy by skilful manoeuvre .
sentences.chinese: 他们施巧计拖垮了敌人。

sentences.english: JiTie mouth inventions open the fence, and went in.
sentences.chinese: 齐铁嘴施巧计打开栅栏，走了进去。

definition: lit. the plum tree withers in place of the peach tree/to substitute one thing for another/to carry the can for sb
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
deceitful in many ways (idiom); wily and mischievous/full of craft and cunning
to lure the tiger from its domain in the mountains (idiom)/to lure an enemy away from his territory
to defeat the enemy by capturing their chief (idiom)
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
a diversion/a feint attack to mislead the enemy
to lend sb a knife to kill sb/to get sb else to do one's dirty work/to attack using the strength of another (idiom)
